arts.ttl: 10 Champions League talking points as Liverpool eye history and Jurgen Klopp wants revenge
arts.sum: The Champions League returns on Tuesday after more than a month, with Liverpool currently leading the way and Manchester City at risk of missing out on the knockout stages

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund monitoring PSV’s Johan Bakayoko as potential Jamie Gittens replacement
arts.sum: As reported by Sacha Tavolieri, Borussia Dortmund are monitoring PSV’s Johan Bakayoko as a potential replacement should Jamie Gittens leave this summer. The Belgium international is no stranger to interest…

arts.ttl: FK Crvena Zvezda-PSV Eindhoven Statistical Preview
arts.sum: FK Crvena Zvezda have won their last four at home, which includes a first Champions League win of the season having beaten VfB Stuttgart in November. PSV's form has been indifferent of late, with the...

arts.ttl: Eredivisie Round Up: Ajax close the gap on PSV as NEC hammer Fortuna Sittard
arts.sum: There were five games in the Eredivisie on Sunday and below is a round up of all the action. NAC Breda 2-1 Twente Two goals in the opening twenty minutes led NAC Breda to a victory over FC Twente.
